代位求償授權書: form of subrogation; letter of subrogation; subrogation form

已知意外之索賠除外: free of calim for accident reported {= f.c.a.r.}

捕獲、扣押除外條款: free of capture and seizure clause {= FC & S Clause}

捕獲、罷工、暴動及民眾騷擾除外: free of capture and seizure etc. and of strikes riots civils commotions {= f.c.s.s.r.c.c.}

部分損害絕對除外: free of damage absolutely {= f.o.d. abs.}

單獨海損除外但機器故障仍賠: free of particular average & breakdown {= f.p.a. & breakdown}

單獨海損除外，除非由於…所引起之損失: free of particular average & loss {= f.p.a. & loss}

單獨海損除外: free of particular average {= f.p.a.; FPA}

單獨海損絕對除外: free of particular average absolutely {= FPA Abs.}

協會貨物保險單獨海損險外條款: free of particular average cover {= f.p.a. cover}

單獨海損除外，除非…: free of particular average unless {= f.p.a. unl.; f.p.a. unless}

單獨海損除外，除非由…所引起: free of particular average unless caused by {= f.p.a.u.c.b.; f.p.a. unless caused by}

暴動及民眾騷擾除外: free of riots and civil commotions {= f.r.c.c.}

全部契約價值或全部完成價值: full contract value or full completed value {= f.c.v.}

如因被保險事故而滅失仍須繳付全額保險費: full premium if lost from a peril insured against {= f.p.i.l.p.i.a.}; full premium if lost from an insured peril {= f.p.i.l.i.p.}

賭博[海上]保險法: Gambling Policies Act {The Marine Insurance Act 1906}

首席承保人同意費率確定後仍可承保: held covered agreed by leading underwriter {= H/C L/U; h/c l/u}

仍可承保: held covered; hold covered {= H/C; h/c}

鉤損及油污損害: hook and oil damage {= h & o}

船體及機器等: hull and machinery etc. {= h.m. etc.}

船體及其屬具{機器}: hull and materials; hull and machinery {= h & m}

增值{貨物或船舶}: increased value {= i.v.; i/v} {cargo or hull}

對港口、碼頭、防波堤等所造成的損害: injury to harbours, wharves, piers etc.

投棄及/或落海損失: jettison and/or loss overboard {= j. and/or l.o.}

投棄及/或波浪捲落: jettison and/or loss washing overboard {= j. and/or w.o.}

聯合船舶保險協議: joint hull Agreement; joint hull understandings

停航退費: laid up return; lay up return; lying up return

卸貨及交貨: landing and delivery {= ldg. and dely.}

首席承保人: leading underwriter {= lead.; l/u}; proposed lead

訴訟費用: legal charges; legal costs; legal expenses

勞依茲共同海損保證書{標準格式}: lloyd's average bond {standard form of average bond}

1940-1945年勞依茲戰時建造船舶索引: lloyd's index of war built vessels 1940-1945

勞依茲日報法律報導: lloyd's list law reports {= ll. l. rep.}

碼頭及港口工人責任: longshoremen's and harbour worker's liability {= l.s.h.w. liab.}

生命喪失及人身傷害: loss of life and personal injery {= l.o.l. & p.i.}

海上及戰爭保險: marine and war risks {= m. & w.}

海上保險單: marine policy; marine insurance policy {= m.i.p.}

自然耗損: natural loss; ordinary wear and tear; wear and tear

1940年紐西蘭運送條款: New Zealand Carriage of Goods Act 1940

報案無索賠: no claim for accident reported {= n.c.a.r.}

裝船前不負責: no risk until on board {= n.r.t.b.}

過船舷欄桿[或裝上火車]前不負責: no risk until on rail {= n.r.t.o.r.}

[保險人]不負責: not at risk; not on risk; no risk {= n.r.}

不前往英國、北美港口: Not calling at British, North American ports or places {= No BNA}

時間保單到期日「附註」註銷通知{拉丁文}: notice of cancellation at anniversary date {= NCAD}

外海鑽油設備: off shore drilling rig; off shore oil drilling rig

承保條: off slip; signer; signing slip; slip
